amendatorysection.catchline: Repealed. Laws 2018, LB377, § 87. Operative date January 1, 2019. Class VI school district; board of education; officers.
amendatorysection.para: The board of education of a Class VI school district shall elect from its members a president, a vice president, a secretary, and a treasurer at the first regular board meeting after the newly elected board members have been sworn in and prior to conducting any other business.
